HomePage.about: Join our auctions to own unique trophy items captured by Ukrainian soldiers and support their fight for freedom.

auction.aboutDescription: Each item is unique and your purchase will help Ukraine in its fight for freedom. Join the auction and contribute to victory.

projectRevenge.title: About Project
projectRevenge.description: Send a message to the Russian occupiers in the form of a personalised shell. Each message supports Ukraine's fight for freedom and will be a just response to all the crimes committed by the russians.

reasons.trustedItems: Receive your lots as soon as possible
reasons.supportUkraine: Your purchases help Ukraine in its fight for freedom
reasons.uniqueCollectibles: Get unique trophies straight from the battlefield

steps.browseItems: Take a look at our current proposition of exclusive trophies
steps.placeBid: Participate in auctions and win your desired items
steps.makeImpact: Your purchases will directly contribute to the defence of Ukraine.

SendMessage.title: Send Your Message to Russian Invaders!
SendMessage.subtitle: But how it works?
SendMessage.description: Our defenders will write your message on the shell and send it to the Russian occupiers, and you will receive a photo confirmation!

form.quickTitle: Receive a photo of your shell in the next 3 days, please make your order in advance!
form.videoTitle: Our defenders will record a video of loading and firing your shell
form.confirmation: We will send you a confirmation that your message has been received.
